Divine Word.quote: "In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God." (John 1:1)

Cosmic Reason.quote: "The Logos is the rational principle governing the cosmos." (Heraclitus)

Universal Law.quote: "The Tao is the way of Heaven and Earth, and the master of all things." (Tao Te Ching 25)

Creative Speech.quote: "And God said, 'Let there be light,' and there was light." (Genesis 1:3)

Eternal Truth.quote: "Truth is one, paths are many." (Mahatma Gandhi)

Sacred Sound.quote: "In the beginning was Prajapati (the Creator); with Him was the Word." (Prajapati Vac, Vedic tradition)

Divine Order.quote: "The Logos maintains the rational order of all things." (Stoic philosophy)

Creative Force.quote: "By the word of the Lord the heavens were made." (Psalm 33:6)

Universal Mind.quote: "The universal mind is the supreme architect." (Plato, Timaeus)

Divine Expression.quote: "Speech is the expression of divine thought." (Sanskrit tradition)

Divine Reason.quote: "Reason is divine and pervades all things." (Marcus Aurelius)

Primordial Sound.quote: "AUM is the primordial vibration from which all creation emerges." (Mandukya Upanishad)

Divine Pattern.quote: "The Logos is the pattern after which all things are made." (Philo of Alexandria)

Sacred Knowledge.quote: "Knowledge of the Logos brings wisdom." (Greek Philosophy)

Eternal Word.quote: "Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will not pass away." (Matthew 24:35)

Universal Truth.quote: "Truth is universal, though its expressions are many." (Sufi tradition)

Cosmic Intelligence.quote: "The universe is governed by divine intelligence." (Aristotle)

Sacred Wisdom.quote: "Wisdom is radiant and unfading." (Wisdom of Solomon 6:12)

Divine Utterance.quote: "Let there be' - the creative word of God." (Genesis 1)

Universal Reason.quote: "Reason is the spark of divine light in all beings." (Stoic philosophy)

Creative Word.quote: "By the Word of God all things came to be." (Early Christian tradition)

Eternal Principle.quote: "The Logos is the eternal principle of order." (Greek Philosophy)

Sacred Order.quote: "The divine order manifests through the Logos." (Hellenistic tradition)
